content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 pound cubed beef stew meat" )
( ing-1 "1 tablespoon all-purpose flour" )
( ing-2 "2 tablespoons olive oil" )
( ing-3 "2 teaspoons butter" )
( ing-4 "1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced" )
( ing-5 "1/4 cup red wine" )
( ing-6 "1 beef bouillon cube" )
( ing-7 "1 cup hot water" )
( ing-8 "1 large potato, cubed" )
( ing-9 "1/2 cup baby carrots" )
( ing-10 "1/2 teaspoon rosemary" )
( ing-11 "1/2 teaspoon dried thyme" )
( ing-12 "1/2 tablespoon garlic powder" )
( ing-13 "1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper" )
( ing-14 "1/4 cup water" )
( ing-15 "2 dashes Worcestershire sauce" )

content.text: 0) Place cubed beef and flour in a resealable plastic bag.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "cubed beef"@9:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "flour"@24:29 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a resealable plastic bag"@33:57 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Seal and shake to evenly coat beef with flour.
2) Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat, and brown beef on all sides.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the oil"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a skillet"@19:28 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "medium heat"@34:45 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "brown"@51:56 / AC
		:ppt ( "beef"@57:61 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "on all sides"@62:74 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Melt the butter in the skillet over medium heat, and cook onion until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the butter"@8:18 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "the skillet"@22:33 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium heat"@39:50 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cook"@56:60 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onion"@61:66 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until tender"@67:79 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Transfer to the slow cooker with the beef.
6) Pour wine into the skillet to deglaze, then pour wine into slow cooker.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "wine"@8:12 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-6-0 "the skillet"@18:29 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-6-0 "to deglaze"@30:40 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "pour"@47:51 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "wine"@52:56 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-6-1 "slow cooker"@62:73 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Dissolve the beef bouillon cube in 1 cup hot water, and pour into slow cooker.
8) Place potato and carrots in slow cooker, and season with rosemary, thyme, garlic powder, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "potato"@9:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "carrots"@20:27 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-8-0 "slow cooker"@31:42 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "season"@48:54 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "rosemary"@60:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "thyme"@70:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "garlic powder"@77:90 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "pepper"@96:102 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Mix in remaining water and Worcestershire sauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "remaining water"@10:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-15 "Worcestershire sauce"@30:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Add more water if needed to cover all ingredients.
11) Cover slow cooker, and cook stew 7 to 8 hours on low heat.
